actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Encouraging increased public awareness of eating disorders and expanded research for treatment and cures.

summary.text: Calls for: (1) increasing public awareness of eating disorders; (2) expanding research for treatment and cures; (3) broadening access to treatment; and (4) promoting healthful eating habits and a healthy body image.

titles.title: Encouraging increased public awareness of eating disorders and expanded research for treatment and cures.
